title: Uncle Si Really Loves to Roast His Producer
description:
Uncle Si admits he loves giving his producer, Hunter, a hard time, but there's a good reason for it! The mysterious Hunter crashes the podcast to defend his honor after the group text fiasco, but Martin isn't having it. Si realizes that Phillip swiped a line from his book. Godwin shares his theory that people with long names can't be trusted. The boys reveal their favorite Duck Call Room hosts, and at least one answer will surprise you. Si tells a hilarious story about his former neighbors. And the boys serve up advice for a couple who can't agree on where to live and a woman with a sister who's 20 years younger.
